task.title: Unpack Instances for Offline Migration
task.shortdesc: This topic describes unpacking instances (VMs) for offline migration on or between Node Controllers (NCs).

ul.li: You follow the appropriate offline migration scenario for your environment; see .
You have verified the prerequisites in your selected offline scenario.
You are prepared to have the NC offline for the duration of the procedure.

taskbody.context:
The packed instance file can be unpacked on any NC running , which may or may not be the same NC. The NC in this topic is the destination NC, where you want the instance to run. The intention is for the destination NC to be running RHEL 7, however if you are running a multi-phase, rolling migration, it is possible that the destination NC be running RHEL 6 for a short while.
